class.name: NanoAmount
class.description: Used to deal with the large sizes for raw amounts of Nano. Get and set functions always deal with a string representing the raw amount. The functions [method get_nano_amount] and [method set_nano_amount] can be used to get and set with NANO amounts (10e30 raw). Internally this uses a Bigint class for representing the amounts.

method.name: add
method.description: Add another NanoAmount to this amount.

method.name: equals
method.description: Returns true if these amounts are equal.

method.name: get_friendly_amount
method.description: Return an amount in NANO with the trailing decimals dropped after decimal_places.

method.name: sub
method.description: Subtract a NanoAmount from this amount.
